content:
The Reply Button is the rightmost button in the message box, this is bad for UX as the primary action most of the users take is Reply. The users also expect the button to be the first.

What are your thoughts?

2018-03-05_0016.swf @Aswin Mohan I think it is better in the original route as more often we go for the new topic too. Generally and favored reply technique explores to the specific topic and advance toward right part and take after down markdown and select Quote and Reply.

We're hoping to do a better job of teaching r for reply, or "click on the message to reply", rather than users clicking on the Reply button.
But interesting point, and could be reasonable to consider.
And why isn't there a compose box by default? Why do we have to click the Reply button to show the Compose box.
